topic.title: Definitions and Conventions for these Guidelines

body.p: The original is the digital facsimiles of a book edition on which the DTA full text is based, unless otherwise noted.

ul.li: the specification of tags or code examples

body.p: The notation U+NNNN refers to a corresponding Unicode character. In the transcription examples, the notation form &#xNNNN; derived from XML is also used in the case of higher bit Unicode characters.
